@@ -28,1 +28,0 @@ -import java.io.UncheckedIOException; @@ -282,3 +281,0 @@ - /// Node names are absolute, `/`-separated path strings, prefixed with - /// either "/modules" or "/packages". - /// @@ -286,1 +282,1 @@ - /// `Node` instances either directly, or by resolving a symbolic link. + /// `Node` instances either directly, or by resolving symbolic links. @@ -290,0 +286,3 @@ + /// + /// @param name an absolute, `/`-separated path string, prefixed with either + /// "/modules" or "/packages". @@ -534,1 +533,7 @@ - // Only visible for use by ExplodedImage. + /** + * Creates an abstract {@code Node}, which is either a resource, directory + * or symbolic link. + * + *

This constructor is only non-private so it can be used by the + * {@code ExplodedImage} class, and must not be used otherwise. + */
